title: 486.05 DISTRICT COURT; REPORTERS' SALARIES AND EXPENSES.
text:
The salary for each court reporter shall be set as provided in judicial branch personnel policies and collective bargaining agreements within the range established under section 480.181 as provided in the judicial branch personnel rules.
[Repealed, 2017 c 95 art 2 s 19]
[Repealed, 1957 c 701 s 3]
[Repealed, 1957 c 701 s 3]
